job.name: MySQL_Service_Example
job.description: This workflow shows how to use PCA to ease deployment of service dependencies. Here, any MySQLTask needs MySQL service. First, a bind_or_start_service task (Examples/5. Cloud Automation Task Templates), specifies the service we want to start, and an instance name, which is inherited by a job variable. Thus, MySQLTask can use a "endpoint" variable where service is running. Everything is handled by the previous bind_or_start_service task. You can share MySQL service reusing the same instance name.

task.name: Start_MySQL_Service
task.description: Start the MySQL server as a service.
